metadata.name: Pomegranate Heart
metadata.description:
This work was created in 2016 at the time of the creation of this animation, and exactly now I decided to post this work in the form of an NFT, my love was one-sided, I felt closed and open at the same time, so many thoughts surfaced in my head as many pomegranate seeds, every time my heart was beating and I I felt it. my love has remained unrequited, but the passion and experience I gained during this are priceless.

Not everyone can drink my rattlesnake key.

———————————————
4 different approaches were used to create this art.

Drawing, neck art, photography, animation, artificial intelligence

When purchasing this NFT, you will also get an animated image in the best quality, where you can see all the details
